value:
$WmMPID_セイラム,ch07_20_Salem_M_Normal,Face|The Loptr Church will not suffer
a traitor. That is law.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Ash?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Ah, my apologies, Lady Sharena.
I was momentarily...distracted.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|When we get back to Askr, we
should free the villages and
towns enclosed in darkness.$k$pWe have our work cut out for us.
Ash, do you think your power will
be able to handle it?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Yes, of course. In fact...hmm...
I believe I will be able to do it about
five or six more times without any
significant issue.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...W-wait a minute.$k$pAsh, you've seemed a bit out of sorts
since we cleared away that darkness
back there. Is something wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Oh, well, about that...$k$pHow do I put this...$k$pIn order to dispel Embla's darkness,
her darkness and my light must come
into contact, you see...$k$pThe darkness is broken, but...the
process is not without its side effects.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You said you can do it another
five or six times...$k$pWhat will happen to you if you
keep going?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Well, again, no guarantees, and the
effects may change or compound in
time, so it is difficult to say exactly.$k$pThat said, as of now, I have begun
to lose feeling in my left leg.$k$pIf I were to guess, I would imagine
I will begin to lose feeling across
all my limbs.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Really? Ash, if that's the case...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Please understand that this is just
a guess on my part, so you need not
base any action on it.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Ash, you've offered us a solution,
but if pursuing it means we have
to sacrifice your health...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Please, there is no call for concern.
I exist to serve you.$k$pMy bodily health is solely for the
benefit of you and the other people
of Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Is that...Askr's will?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Oh, no. These are my own thoughts.$k$pI am neither a member of any family
nor a beloved noble like others here.$k$pTherefore, there is no need for any to
worry over me from my perspective.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But, y-you'll...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Do not worry! I have only a little
power remaining within me as it
stands, so everything is in order.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What? Only...a little?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Yes. It has been, oh, hundreds of
years now, but on a prior mission
as retainer to Lord Askr...$k$pI met with a group of mortals, like
I have met with you all.$k$pTo grant their requests, I performed
various services.$k$pTo make the country of Askr lush
and green, I poured most of my
power into the land.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Then...all of our bountiful crops
and abundance of flowers is thanks
to you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|All of Askr's prosperity...was created
from the fruits of your sacrifice?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I do not think of it as a sacrifice.
It is merely my duty to serve.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I understand, Ash. Thank you for
explaining.$k$pThat said, I only want to use your
power when absolutely necessary.
All right?$k$pIs there some other way we could
dispel the darkness? Would defeating
Letizia be enough to undo things?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|No. Unfortunately, she is not the
source of the darkness—it is the
power of Lady Embla.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|In that case...$k$pWould defeating Embla set
things right?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ah... Yes. I believe so. I can see
no other alternative, but...$k$pAs a mortal, you have little chance
of killing a god, Lord Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Don't you worry! My brother can
defeat any foe—god or demon!
Right, Alfonse?!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|My sincerest apologies. It seems
I underestimated your abilities.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We will rid ourselves of that darkness
one way or another. But first we need
to confront Director Letizia...$k$p$Sbs150|
